p: The blood samples were collected in vacutainer tubes without an anti-coagulant, labeled and stored in a cooler box with ice packs while in the field. Before blood collection, animals were restrained into the crush or by use of ropes and halters. The blood was allowed to coagulate before serum was separated into a 1.5 ml cryovial tube, labeled and stored in a cool box with ice packs until transfer to the laboratory for analysis. Serum samples were stored at -80Â°C until analysis.
